Ashwin Kalyan

Research Scientist @ AI2

gmail.com | allenai.org

I am currently traveling and responses to emails can be delayed.


I am a research scientist at AI2 and a member of the Aristo team. Check out my publications on Google Scholar and some of my talks.

I completed my PhD from Georgia Tech and my bachelors from NIT Surathkal. I am thankful to all my wonderful collaborators who have supported me.

I perform Karnatic Music on the violin and learn from Vid. A Kanyakumari. Check out recordings from my concerts on SoundCloud.
